about_the_game:
Welcome to Epsilon Labs, where the future is You, both Now and Tomorrow!

In This Mod...

  • Explore a new wing of Aperture Science focused on the creation of Portal Guns.
  • Play as a scientist working at this research centre, and traverse it's dilapidated remains after an unforeseen accident sends you forward in time.
  • Go through never before seen tests and try out new technology in order to return to your timeline.



Portal: Singularity Collapse is a mod set in Epsilon Labs.
This part of Aperture Science houses a black hole which brings new technology to the table.
Some might use it for good, and some might use it to create a tear in time and space.
You get to explore other shafts of aperture that were hidden and blocked off for the Astronauts, War Heroes and Olympians...

Features:

  • New testing elements, including the Supercharged Laser - a blue laser variant that splits into two normal ones when in contact with the redirection cubes.
  • New puzzles set in new, never before seen areas of Aperture.
  • New styles, including Recycled Aperture!
  • Overhauled textures, graphics, with new technologies (thanks Strata!)
  • Original Soundtrack
  • More to come, so stay tuned!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i3-8300 or similar AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or similar AMD GPU. Requires at least Vulkan 1.3
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
